meanings.definition: A small electronic device that performs arithmetic and logic operations in a computer.
meanings.sent1: The microprocessor calculates numbers quickly in the computer.
meanings.sent2: The microprocessor is the brain of the computer.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that the microprocessor challenged the calculator to a math duel.
meanings.sent4: The microprocessor is like a tiny mathematician inside the computer.
meanings.sent5: The microprocessor buzzes with activity, solving problems in an instant.

meanings.definition: The central processing unit of a computer.
meanings.sent1: Every computer needs a microprocessor to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The microprocessor processes all the data in the computer.
meanings.sent3: The microprocessor threw a party and invited all the other computer components.
meanings.sent4: In the world of computers, the microprocessor reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The microprocessor is the heart that keeps the computer alive.
